subtasks.name: Implement environment Zod schema
subtasks.details:
### Purpose
Create a typed schema to validate environment variables at startup.

### Preconditions
- `npm install zod` already satisfied (see package.json).

### Artifacts To Create/Modify
- `src/config/schema/environment.schema.ts`

### Step-by-Step
1. Run `bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; cat <<'EOF' > src/config/schema/environment.schema.ts
import { z } from 'zod';

export const environmentSchema = z.object({
  NODE_ENV: z.enum(['development', 'test', 'production']).default('development'),
  CODEX_HOME: z.string().min(1, 'CODEX_HOME must point to ~/.codemachine/codex'),
  CODEMACHINE_MODE: z.enum(['build', 'template']).default('build'),
  LOG_LEVEL: z.enum(['debug', 'info', 'warn', 'error']).default('info'),
  TELEMETRY_ENABLED: z.coerce.boolean().default(false)
});

export type EnvironmentConfig = z.infer<typeof environmentSchema>;
EOF"`.
2. Stage file with `bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; git add src/config/schema/environment.schema.ts"`.

#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

DRY_RUN=false
while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
  case $1 in
    --dry-run) DRY_RUN=true; shift ;;
    --tag) TAG=$2; shift 2 ;;
    *) echo "Unknown option $1"; exit 1 ;;
  esac
done

npm run validate

else

fi

### Purpose
Automate git reset and npm unpublish dry-run steps for failed releases.

### Preconditions
- Subtasks T15.1 and T15.2 complete.

### Artifacts To Create/Modify

### Step-by-Step
1. Run `bash -lc "set -euo pipefail; cat <<'EOF' > scripts/ops/rollback.sh
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

DRY_RUN=false
TAG='<NPM_TAG>'

while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
  case $1 in
    --dry-run) DRY_RUN=true; shift ;;
    --tag) TAG=$2; shift 2 ;;
    *) TAG=$1; shift ;;
  esac
done

echo '[rollback] reverting commit and package (dry run: '"$DRY_RUN"')'
if [[ $DRY_RUN == false ]]; then
  git tag -d "$TAG" || true
  git reset --hard HEAD~1
  npm unpublish "codemachine@$TAG" --force
else
  printf 'Dry run: git tag -d %s\n' "$TAG"
  printf 'Dry run: git reset --hard HEAD~1\n'
  printf 'Dry run: npm unpublish codemachine@%s --force\n' "$TAG"
fi
EOF"`.
